abstract: Uber is starting its driverless car pilot program in Pittsburgh on Wednesday with a small fleet of modified Ford Fusions.
snippet: Uber is starting its driverless car pilot program in Pittsburgh on Wednesday with a small fleet of modified Ford Fusions.
lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH — I’m parked on a patch of gravel outside the old Heinz ketchup bottling factory here early on a Monday morning, and I’m frustrated. My Uber self-driving car will not start driving itself.

headline.main: What It Feels Like to Ride in a Self-Driving Uber
headline.print_headline: Riding Shotgun for an Uber Test
